ValidationRule.description: Restrict edits on the quote fields after quote has been accepted.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator", $Profile.Name <>"Finance",
OR(
AND ( (TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))= "Accepted") , (TEXT(Status)= "Accepted")), AND ( (TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))= "Rejected") , (TEXT(Status)= "Rejected")),
AND ( (TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))= "Accepted") , (TEXT(Status)!= "Accepted")), AND ( (TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))= "Rejected") , (TEXT(Status)!= "Rejected")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cant edit the fields once the quote has been accepted
